= mr-common-core =

This module is the *base* for the others modules.


== Features details ==

  * Spring core support (context load).
  * Utils classes for:
    * I/O strams
    * String parsing
    * Object formatters
    * i18n
    * Exception handling with i18n support
    * Collections

_This module is a part of *[Introduction mr-common]* framework_.
